translations: n.谚语，格言，警句；（尤指宗教或政治领袖的）重要讲话，教诲
v.说，讲；宣称，说明；认为，据说（say 的现在分词）

phrs.translation: 不言而喻；理所当然；自不待言

sentences.sentence: Oh, I see what you're saying.
There's no saying how he'll react.
sentences.translation: 很难说他会有何种反应。

sentences.sentence: I can just imagine him saying that!
sentences.translation: 我确实能想到他那么说！
